en-US.name: Hulk Pack
en-US.summary: The hulk pack is a great addition because you will hear facts about hulk.
en-US.description: The hulk pack expands the set of facts shared with you to include facts about hulk.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The hulk pack adds over 10 hulk facts into the set of facts randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the hulk pack.  You now have access to hulk facts!
